body_html: I know very little about go, so that sounds fine, but a go expert should probably chime in here. In some future world we'll hopefully have shared library distributions of the C++ core that doesn't require building during go get, and then this can probably be cleaned up.

body: I know very little about go, so that sounds fine, but a go expert should probably chime in here.  In some future world we'll hopefully have shared library distributions of the C++ core that doesn't require building during go get, and then this can probably be cleaned up.
